name: Web Developer Simulator PC
description:
This game is all about Creating Web! You build up your company by just doing nothing but WEB! Buy servers, customize your server's specifications, build Websites, customize your Websites, and more! Grow your company and become the Worlds most successful Web Dev Company! :D

*Features*
Start a Web Development Company
Hire an Employee
Buy Computers
Buy Servers
Customize Server's Specs
Build a Website
Customize your Website's Features
Buy Larger Offices
Have the most Active Users among others
Become Market Leader

More Features to come in the Future!


If u have any complaints please Contact me via Email: edee@edeesigns.com
